import { useContext } from 'react' import { Button } from '../navbar/Button' import { Context } from '../../context' function StepOne() { const { inputName, setInputName, inputEmail, setInputEmail, inputPhone, setInputPhone } = useContext(Context) const handleName = (event) => { setInputName( event.target.value.replace(/[А-Яа-яёЁ]|[0-9]|[!/?><.,/'";:{}=+-_()&^%$#@*§|~`]/, '') ) } const handleEmail = (event) => { setInputEmail(event.target.value.replace(/[А-Яа-яёЁ]|[{}%§~`]/, '')) } const handlePhoneNumber = (event) => { setInputPhone(event.target.value.replace(/^((8|+7)[- ]?)?((?d{3})?[- ]?)?[d- ]{7,10}$/)) } return (
